channel.title: Thoughts on Yiwen Wu
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on Yiwen Wu

item.title: Ideas of Sentiment Analysis Project
item.description: Sentiment Analysis of Online Education Programs The sentiment analysis (SA) by Liu 2014 brought many good aspects to both academics and web-based industries. 当下SA已经被用于分析顾客反馈，例如航空网络售票系统。 对于用网络授课的公司网页系统，我们将进行网页数据抓取(web scraping)，然后利用Liu的方法进行public opinion分析。主要步骤如下： Retriving Parsing Exploring & Analyzing Visualizing 研究目的如下： 探索学生偏好。由于网上教育是一种新型授课模式，用public opinion的方式来探索学生对课程的评价 教育项目/课程评估 教师评估 References for future students and program managers

item.title: Make Neighborhood Green Again
item.description: West Lawrence Greening Project This is a story map made through https://storymaps.arcgis.com/en/. The story map demonstrates the lack of walkability and canopy in West Lawrence neighborhoods. More details can be found at https://www.arcgis.com/apps/Cascade/index.html?appid=21536c10fe15412aa449045c9c6b0444. A simple run of mathematical formula in .RMD \[ {J(\theta) =\frac{1}{2m} [\sum^m_{i=1}(h_\theta(x^{(i)}) - y^{(i)})2 + \lambda\sum^n_{j=1}\theta^2_j} \] ### md vs .rmd in blogdown title with 3 #s
